Text:
I saw this film once. I don't understand why they decided to name it 'Holocaust'.

The important part when watching films such as this one is to remember that it is not based upon facts. It is just a film with actors, and the intention seems to be to portray or depict the Germans in a bad light, and to create enmity whilst doing so.

'Horrible fate of extermination', that is almost laughable. Oh well.

Hi kOnsl,
Were your parents brother and sister by any chance?
yup, i believe they are in fact siblings.
"the intention seems to be to portray or depict the Germans in a bad light"  *lol*
No, TattyBoogles, they weren't. What that has to do with this B-film is something I don't understand.

k0nsl wrote:
"The important part when watching films such as this one is to remember that it is not based upon facts."

Not based on facts as such that the holocaust didnt happend? or what do you mean?

You know the holocaust did happend, claiming anything else is just n a z i progpaganda.

>What that has to do with this B-film is something I don't understand.

Well, that kinda proves his point. (My guess is that they were)
